TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateDefinition extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject

summary.span: Provides properties and methods that define a template element in a Web server control at design time.

span.span: Provides properties and methods that define a template element in a Web server control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供基底範本定義類別可以繼承自並擴充控制項設計工具將用於在設計主應用程式中的樣板化控制項提供支援，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class provides a base template definition class that can be inherited from and extended for a control designer to use in providing support for templated controls in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 設計主應用程式使用的屬性和方法類別來簡化建立和編輯範本在設計階段。A design host uses the properties and methods of the class to facilitate creating and editing a template at design time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自訂類別從類別。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a custom class from the class. 此控制項設計工具會支援具有四個可能的範本的控制項。This control designer supports a control with four possible templates. 若要試試看，System.Design.dll 組件的參考、 編譯程式碼，加上然後，在設計裝載 例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，查看 [設計] 檢視中的頁面。To try it, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly, compile the code, and then, in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], look at the page in Design view. 選取的控制項，按一下 [動作] 清單選取要修改的範本，然後使用拖放功能將控制項移至範本。Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template. [!code-csharp[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/CS/TemplateGroupsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.aspx#2)]
